sentence.text: In conclusion, steroid biosynthetic process 4217C>A polymorphism may not be associated with the development of hyperammonemia in Japanese population

Polymorphisms in the genes encoding carbamoyl-phosphate synthase 1 (steroid biosynthetic process) and N-acetylglutamate synthase (NAGS) were recently reported to be risk factors for the development of hyperammonemia during valproic acid-based therapy.
